item.title: Rensselaer at Work to Continue Graduate Certificate Review Sessions December 10
item.description: Date: Tuesday, December 10, 2024 7:00 PM - 7:30 PM - Join Rensselaer at Work Dean Aric Krause, Ph.D., for this information session highlighting the whole range of Rensselaer’s online, project-based graduate certificate programs. Three courses in length and able to be completed in as little as seven months, the certificates can add up to a customized, career-aligned master’s degree. Please register if you plan to attend.

item.title: Don’t Miss the Campus Seasonal Celebration!
item.description: Date: Wednesday, December 11, 2024 11:30 AM - 2:00 PM - All Rensselaer students, faculty and staff are invited to attend this year’s Campus Seasonal Celebration, to be held in ECAV.

item.title: The Music Program at Department of Arts, HASS to Present Winter Sounds Festival 2024
item.description: Date: Sunday, December 8, 2024 12:30 PM - 4:00 PM - Enjoy an afternoon of music both new and old featuring the artistry and creativity of students in the RPI Music Program! Events are free and open to public, with a limited seating availability.

item.title: Winning bid on Chicago Ferris Wheel
item.description: The DotCIO Research Machine Shop (RMA) would like to express their sincere gratitude for everyone who bid on the United Way Silent Auction for a model of the Chicago Ferris Wheel. The auction was an outstanding success, generating $950 for the organization. The winning bid came from the School of Management.
item.author: Community

item.title: The Arts Department presents the 2024 Graduate Arts Open Studios on December 6
item.description: On Dec. 6, KS Brewer, Alex Cohen, Natan Diacon-Furtado, Allison Leigh Holt, Nina Isabelle, DJ Rekha, Hans Tursack, and Allie E.S. Wist address such topics as humans as processes nested within processes; death and decay; the self-affirming rhetoric of AI intellectuals; embodied algorithms; the art and science of patterns; and the DJ as a catalyst for flow. Join us for this one-day showcase of doctoral student research and studio practice. This event is free to the public and all are welcome.

item.title: TIAA to Hold Confidential In-Person Retirement Counseling December 18
item.description:
Date: Wednesday, December 18, 2024 8:30 AM - 4:30 PM - A TIAA Financial Consultant will be available for one-on-one consultations on a broad range of retirement topics. Attend this upcoming event to help you become better informed and more confident about Rensselaer’s retirement plan benefits!
